Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: ease of use, for people whith out experience, set on auto and take great pictures, I got one for me, than a hunting club I belong to liked it so I bught one for them.

8 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
